chapter.text: A L. R. This bol scripture verses zdokonalit potom elucidated It pojdem z Wise Cognizant
Proclaiming Ona nie kult GOD Ja pojdem ona Him warner i mat rad bearer z dobry zvest

Ona seek tvoj Lord's forgiveness potom repent Him. He will potom zehnat ty generously for predetermined period bestow Jeho grace upon those zasluzit it Ona turn potom ja fear for ona retribution awesome dni
Do GOD bol tvoj ultimate spatny listok He bol Omnipotent
Indeed they zatajit ich innermost thoughts mat rad if keep Him z zauzlit them! Skutocne mat rad they pokryvka ich clothes He zauzlit all ich secrets declarations. He zauzlit innermost thoughts
There nie bol creature zem provision nie zaruka GOD A He zauzlit its course its zaverecny destiny. All som zapisnica profound rekord

He je Jeden created heavens zem 6 dni -Jeho (earthly) domain completely pokryvka s zavlazit! -v poradie do test ona distinguish those ona zavodny righteousness! lenze when ona say Ona resurrected smrt those disbelieve say This bol clearly witchcraft
A if my zdrzat retribution they incurred -for my rezervovat it specific obec -they say Co keeping Him? skutocne once it pojdem them nothing zastavit it ich mocking will pod haunt them
Whenever my zehnat human bol s zlutovanie us potom zosadit it he turns despondent unappreciative
Whenever my zehnat him adversity afflicted him he says All adversity ist mna; he becomes vzrusit proud
Mat rad for those kto steadfastly persevere lead righteous zivot they zasluzit forgiveness generous recompense
Ona zelat disregard some z kto revealed ona ona annoyed it I they say "Ako pod nie treasure pod him angel? Ona som len warner; GOD controls all things
they say He fabricated (Quran) tell them Potom produce 10 suras mat rad these fabricated invite whomever ona viem GOD ona bol truthful
they zlyhat schodza tvoj challenge potom zauzlit lenze this revealed GOD's znalost a ze there nie bol god except He! Ona potom submit
Those pursue this worldly zivot its latka vanities my platit them ich robota v this zivot maly zlava
bol they dat up ich share Hereafter consequently Hell bol ich lot! All ich robota je v vain everything they robit nullified

Mat rad for those dat solid proof z ich Lord zvest svedok z Him a it rezervovat si Moses set precedent zlutovanie they iste verit. Mat rad for those disbelieve various zoskupit Hell awaiting them. Nie harbor any doubt this bol truth tvoj Lord vela zaludnit disbelieve
Kto zly than those je fabricate laicky GOD They presented ich Lord svedok say These je jeden kto lied ich Lord GOD's condemnation befallen transgressors
They zapudit way GOD seek robit it crooked they bol disbelievers Hereafter
These never escape nor will they zalozit any lords zvladnut pomoc them against GOD Retribution zdvojnasobit them. They zlyhat hear they zlyhat see
These je jeden lose ich souls idols they fabricated disown them
There bol ziaden doubt ze Hereafter they je zly losers
Mat rad for those verit lead righteous zivot devote ich Lord they je dwellers Raj; they abide therein forever
Vzor these 2 zoskupit bol blind deaf compared do seer hearer! they je equal Ona nie berie heed
My sent Noah jeho ludia saying ja pojdem ona zretelny warner
Ona nie kult GOD Ja fear for ona retribution painful dni

leaders disbelieved jeho ludia said My see ona bol ziaden inak than human bol us my see ze prvy zaludnit nasledovat ona je the zly among us! My see ona nie possess any advantage us. Indeed my myslienka ona bol liars
He said O moj ludia co ja have solid proof z moj Lord co if He zehnat mna Jeho zlutovanie ona nie see it My ist force ona je verit therein
(O moj ludia ja nie ziadat ona any peniaze; moj wage pojdem len z GOD Ja nie vypustit z hlavy those verit; they schodza ich Lord He alone judge them). Ja see ona bol ignorant ludia
O moj ludia support mi GOD ja vypustit z hlavy them? Ona nie berie heed

(Ja nie reklamacia ja possess treasures GOD nor robit ja zauzlit buduci nor robit ja reklamacia bol angel. Nor robit ja say do those despised tvoj oci ze GOD will nie bestow any blessings them! GOD zauzlit LEPSIE CO bol ICH innermost thoughts! Ja robit this) ja bol transgressor
They said O Noah ona argued us kept arguing My challenge ona bring doom ona threaten us ona bol truthful
He said GOD bol Jeden brings it ona if He wills potom ona nie escape
Vecer if ja radit ona moj rada nie benefit ona it je GOD's will send ona astray! He bol tvoj Lord Him ona spatny listok
they say He robit up this story potom say ja robit potom ja bol zodpovedny moj zlocin ja bol innocent z any zlocin ona commit
Noah nie inspirovat z tvoj ludia verit beyond those already verit! Nie saddened ich cin
Build ark our watchful oci our inspiracia nie implore Mi on behalf z those transgressed they destined drown
chvila he building ark whenever some z jeho ludia ist okolo him they laughed him. He said Ona laughing us my laughing ona iba mat rad ona laughing
Ona robit iste zalozit out kto suffer shameful retribution incur everlasting punishment
When our judgment pojdem atmosphere boiled over my said Beriem it pair z each laskavy dohromady s tvoj rodina those condemned Beriem ona those verit len a few verit him
He said Pod on board V the vola sa z GOD bol its sailing its mooring Moj Lord bol Forgiver Merciful
mat rad it sailed them do kyvat mat rad hills Noah vola sa jeho syn izolovat O moj syn pojdem ride us robi nie bol disbelievers
He said ja berie refuge hill chranit mna zavlazit. He said Nothing chranit ktokolvek dnes GOD's judgment len those worthy Jeho zlutovanie saved kyvat separated them he je among those kto drowned
It proclaimed O zem zhltnut tvoj zavlazit O sky cease zavlazit potom subsided judgment fulfilled ark finally zvysok on hills Judea. It potom proclaimed transgressors zdochnut
Noah implored jeho Lord Moj Lord moj syn bol member z moj rodina Tvoj promise bol truth. Ona bol wisest z the wise
He said O Noah he nie bol z tvoj rodina. bol unrighteous ziadat Mna nieco ona nie zauzlit! Ja enlighten ona lest ona bol the ignorant
He said Moj Lord ja seek refuge Ona lest ja implore Ona znova nieco ja nie zauzlit. Ona forgive mna have zlutovanie mna ja bol losers
It proclaimed O Noah disembark peace blessings ona narod zostupit tvoj companions. Mat rad for inaksie narod zostupit z ona my zehnat them for awhile potom commit them painful retribution
This bol zvest minuly my reveal ona. Ona nie had znalost them -neither ona nor tvoj ludia -before this. Therefore bol chory. ultimate victory belongs do the righteous
Do ‘Aad my sent ich brat Hood He said O moj ludia kult GOD ona nie have inak god Him. Ona inventing
O moj ludia ja nie ziadat ona any wage Moj wage pojdem len 1 kto zasvatit mna! Ona nie chapat
O moj ludia seek forgiveness tvoj Lord potom repent Him. He potom lejak ona provisions sky zvacsit tvoj strength! Nie turn transgressors
They said O Hood ona nie show us any proof my nie zhyraly our gods on zisk z co ona say My never bol believers ona
My verit some z our gods afflicted ona curse He said ja bear svedok GOD ona bear svedok i ja disown idols ona set
beside Him. So dat mna tvoj collective decision without oneskorenie
Ja put moj trust GOD moj Lord tvoj Lord There nie bol creature He nie control Moj Lord bol na pravo chodnicek
Ona turn ja delivered ona co ja sent s. Moj Lord zastupid inak ludia do tvoj miesto; ona nie harm Him v the maly Moj Lord bol do control z all things
When our judgment pojdem my saved Hood those verit him zlutovanie us. My saved them hrozny retribution
Such bol ‘Aad -they disregarded revelations ich Lord disobeyed Jeho posol nasledovat ways kazdy zaryty tyrant
Consequently they incurred condemnation v this world Dni Vzkriesenie. Indeed ‘Aad zamietnut ich Lord Indeed ‘Aad ludia Hood zdochnut

Do Thamoud my sent ich brat Saaleh. He said O moj ludia kult GOD ona nie have inak god Him. He zasvatit ona zem potom zaplatit ona do it Ona seek Jeho forgiveness potom repent Him. Moj Lord je vzdy zblizit sa responsive
They said O Saaleh ona pouzivat bol popular among us this. Ona enjoining us z kult co our rodicia kult? My bol full z doubt everything ona told us
He said O moj ludia co ja have solid proof z moj Lord zlutovanie Him? Kto support mi GOD ja disobeyed Him? Ona len zvacsit moj loss
O moj ludia this bol GOD's camel serve mat rad proof for ona. Ona let ju jestn GOD's zem robi nie touch ju any harm lest ona incur immediate retribution
They slaughtered ju. He potom said Ona have len 3 dni zit This bol prophecy bol inevitable
When our judgment pojdem my saved Saaleh those verit him zlutovanie us humiliation ze dni. Tvoj Lord bol the Vela Mocny Almighty
Those transgressed annihilated disaster vlavo them ich domov dead
Je mat rad if they never zivy there Indeed Thamoud zamietnut ich Lord Absolutely Thamoud incurred ich annihilation
When our posol ist Abraham dobry zvest they said Peace. He said Peace skoro brought roasted calf
When he saw ich hands nie touch it he became suspicious fearful z them. They said je afraid my dispatched ludia Lot
Jeho manzelka standing ona laughed when my dat ju dobry zvest Isaac after Isaac Jacob
Ona said Woe mna ako ja bear dieta moj vek tu bol moj muz stara clovek? This bol skutocne strange
They said ona zalozit it strange for GOD GOD bestowed JEHO ZLUTOVANIE blessings ONA O inhabitants shrine He bol Zasluzny Glorious
When Abraham's fear subsided dobry zvest delivered him he proceeded argue us on behalf z Lot's ludia
Indeed Abraham bol clement extremely laskavy obedient
O Abraham zdrzat sa z this. Tvoj Lord's judgment issued they incurred unavoidable retribution
When our posol ist Lot they mistreated he zmiast ich presence. He said This bol difficult dni

Jeho ludia pojdem rushing; they grown zvyknuty do ich sinful cin! He said O moj zaludnit bol purer ona if ona berie moj dcera radsej! Ona reverence GOD robi nie zmiast mna moj guests! Have ona nie jeden reasonable clovek ona
They said Ona zauzlit lepsie lenze my have ziaden need tvoj dcera; ona zauzlit exactly co my chudoba
He said Ja zelat si ja bol strong enough had mocny ally

(angels) said O Lot my je tvoj Lord's posol these ludia nie touch ona. Ona lavy tvoj rodina night let nie ktokolvek z ona look zadny tvoj manzelka; ona condemned along s those condemned Ich appointed lehota bol rano. Nie bol rano skoro enough
When our judgment pojdem my turned upside nadol, my lejak it hard devastating rocks
Such rocks designated tvoj Lord strike transgressors
Do Midyan my sent ich brat Shu aib. He said O moj ludia kult GOD ona nie have inak god Him. Nie cheat when ona measure weigh! Ja see ona bol prosperous ja fear ona retribution overwhelming dni
O moj zaludnit ona dat full measure full weight equitably! Nie cheat ludia ich na pravo nie roam zem corruptingly
Whatever GOD zadovazit for ona ziaden zalezitost ako male je daleko lepsie ona if ona bol skutocne believers. Ja nie bol guardian over ona
They said O Shu aib tvoj nabozenstvo dictate ona ze my zhyraly our rodicia nabozenstvo musiet running our zalezitost any chovanie my zvolit si? Iste ona zauzlit for bol clement wise

He said O moj ludia co ja have solid proof z moj Lord co He zadovazit mna velky zehnat Nie bol moj zelat commit co ja enjoin ona z. Ja len zelat toje spravne vela chybny mat rad ja viem. Moj guidance zavisiet totally GOD ja put moj trust Him. Do Him ja totally submitted
A O moj ludia nie provoked tvoj opposition mna into incurring same disasters ludia Noah ludia z Hood ludia z Saaleh; ludia Lot nie bol i daleko z ona
Ona implore tvoj Lord forgiveness potom repent Him. Moj Lord bol Merciful Laskavy
They said O Shu aib my nie comprehend vela z things ona telling us my see ona bol powerless among us. If nie bol tvoj tribe my stoned ona. Ona have value us
He said O moj ludia moj tribe command velka zretel than GOD this why ona je bol heedless z Him? Moj Lord je fully aware z everything ona robit

O moj ludia ist on robit co ona zelat a so will ja! Ona robit istota zalozit out kto z us incur shameful retribution; ona robit zalozit out kto liar bol Iba cakat anticipation ja cakat anticipation ona
When our judgment pojdem my saved Shu aib those verit him zlutovanie us. Mat rad for zlo jeden they struck disaster ze vlavo them dead do ich domov
Je mat rad though they never existed Thus Midyan zdochnut iba mat rad Thamoud zdochnut before ze
My sent Moses our znamenie profound authority
Do Pharaoh jeho elders they nasledovat command Pharaoh Pharaoh's command nie bol wise
He lead jeho ludia Dni Vzkriesenie all the way do Hell; co chudobny abode do zit v
They incurred condemnation v this zivot i mat rad on Dni Vzkriesenie; co chudobny chodnicek nasledovat
This bol zvest minuly obec my narrate ona. Some som still standing some zmiznut
My never zlo them; they zlo ich own souls. Ich gods they vzyvat GOD nie pomoc them v the maly when judgment tvoj Lord pojdem. Skutocne they len ensured ich doom
Such retribution enforced tvoj Lord when obec transgressed Indeed Jeho retribution bol painful devastating
This bol lekcia those fear retribution Hereafter Ze je dni when all ludia zvolat -Dni svedok
My appointed specific cas it berie miesto
Dni it pojdem nie ist okolo soul utter single word v accordance s Jeho will Some bol chudobny some bol happy
Mat rad for chudobny jeden they bol Hell wherein they sigh kvilit
Eternally they abide therein mat rad long mat rad heavens zem endure v accordance s will tvoj Lord Tvoj Lord bol doer z whatever He wills
Mat rad for fortunate jeden they bol Raj. Eternally they abide therein mat rad long mat rad heavens zem endure v accordance s will tvoj Lord -everlasting reward
have any doubt zretel co these ludia kult; they kult exactly mat rad they zalozit ich rodicia kult My requite them ich due share fully zlava
My dat Moses scripture it disputed a it je for predetermined word decreed tvoj Lord they judged ihned! They bol full z doubt about this suspicious
Tvoj Lord iste recompense everyone ich robota. He je fully Cognizant z everything they robit
Therefore zotrvat chodnicek ona enjoined nasledovat dohromady those repented ona nie transgress! He bol Seer z everything ona robit
Nie chudy towards those transgressed lest ona incur Hell zalozit nie allies pomoc ona GOD potom koniec losers
Ona observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) both koniec z dni night. righteous robota wipe zly robota. This bol reminder those berie heed
Ona steadfastly persevere GOD never zlyhat recompense the righteous

If len some z those among previous generations possessed enough inteligencia zakazat zly! Len a few z them zasluzit saved us! Mat rad for transgressors they preoccupied ich latka luxuries; they bol guilty
Tvoj Lord never annihilates any obec unjustly chvila its ludia bol righteous
(Had tvoj Lord willed all ludia bol 1 congregation believers). they vzdy dispute (truth)
(Len those zehnat s zlutovanie z tvoj Lord nie dispute truth)! This why He created them. judgment tvoj Lord already issued ja fill Hell jinns humans all dohromady
My narrate ona enough history posol zosilnit tvoj srdce truth pojdem ona tu i mat rad enlightenments reminders believers
Say do those disbelieve Robit whatever ona viem a so robit my
Potom caka; my i cakat
Do GOD belongs buduci z heavens zem all zalezitost controlled Him! Ona kult Him trust Him. Tvoj Lord je never unaware z anything ona robit
